data: Chester Pelton retracted his paunch as far as the breakfast seat would permit; the table, its advent preceded by a collection of mouth-watering aromas, slid noiselessly out of the pantry and clicked into place in front of him.
Piper, H. Beam, 1904-1964; McGuire, John J. (John Joseph), 1917-1981; Van Dongen, H. R., 1920-2010 [Illustrator]
